title: (x) Something Sweet casual script - Tiki Holiday {Dan Heffernan}
content:
Hi, I need to find the font for this. Closest I found was Murray Hill Bold, but I have to match this exactly..

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121102080630im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Satisfy_6214.jpg)
author: misalion

comments.content: Man. I was thinking House all the time but didn’t think of that one. Seems to be squooched (?), though.
